title: ‘Transformational’ Tymewear Breathing Sensor Used by Visma Hits the Market: Should You Get One?
content:
Will the revolutionary wearables being used by Visma-Lease a Bike become the next must-have training tool? Here's all you need to know about the 'VitalPro.'

Read the full article at ‘Transformational’ Tymewear Breathing Sensor Used by Visma Hits the Market: Should You Get One? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
